org.drip.param.config

Class XMLConfigReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.param.config.XMLConfigReader

  • public class XMLConfigReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the configuration intialization functionality. It parses the XML configuration file and extracts the information, tag pairs – such as holiday sets for different locations, logger location, analytics server connection strings, database server connection strings.
